title: Visual Scaffolding Design Strategies for Web-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Case-based content delivery for practical application, requiring responsive design optimized for BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of designing science content using visual scaffolding elements (spatial arrangement, tool placement, visibility, etc.).
Learners can apply seven strategies for visualizing task structure/process/cognitive processes in web-based environments to practical work.
Learners can establish customized visual scaffolding designs considering learner characteristics (job level, cognitive style).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
